item.title: How's the Road Ahead?
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: We wrote a book! This was never on the agenda. It wasn’t even till the end of the road trip that the idea was suggested by Parul. We thought about it and stashed it away for another day. Then, life happened. We got busy with the trite of existence and the project lay somewhere on the shelves. But it had a tenacious grip on our subconscious. We actively started thinking about it once again when Parul drafted a chapter as an anniversary gift last year.
